dashboard.label: 入力の移行 (Dashboard Studio)
dashboard.description: 移行後に手動で微調整済み
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"リンクリスト(可視化のスイッチ) - Table"},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"リンクリスト(可視化のスイッチ) - Chart","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true},"context":{}},"viz_map_1":{"type":"splunk.map","options":{"center":[30.810646,-10.556976],"zoom":2,"layers":[{"type":"bubble","latitude":"> primary | seriesByName('latitude')","longitude":"> primary | seriesByName('longitude')","bubbleSize":"> primary | frameWithoutSeriesNames('_geo_bounds_east', '_geo_bounds_west', '_geo_bounds_north', '_geo_bounds_south', 'latitude', 'longitude') | frameBySeriesTypes('number')"}]},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"リンクリスト(可視化のスイッチ) - Map"},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"リンクリスト - 国別リファラ集計","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"xAxisLabelRotation":-45,"xAxisTitleVisibility":"show"},"context":{}},"viz_table_2":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_6"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"マルチセレクト - 曜日別ユーザ行動"},"viz_chart_3":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_7"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"ラジオボタン - Internal Server Error - メソッド毎集計: $Method$","options":{},"context":{}},"viz_chart_4":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_8"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"ドロップダウン - Internal Server Error - アクセス元: $Country$","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true},"context":{}},"viz_table_3":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"drilldown":"none","rowNumbers":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_9"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"テキスト入力 - Internal Server Error - Top $number$ IPアドレス","description":"2023_TGCON_Text"},"viz_chart_5":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_10"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"パネル内入力 - Internal Server Error - 国別分布","options":{},"context":{}},"viz_91QvO1qi":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"- 入力(Inputs) の大半はDashboard Studio にすべて移行される。
- 一部の入力方式(Checkboc、Linklist)はドロップダウンにマージされる。
- Condition Token を使った入力は機能が無視されたまま移行される。
- パネル内に設置した入力は入力パネルそのものが移行されない。","fontColor":"#00bfff"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial status=5*
| iplocation clientip
| stats count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"DS_Input_Dropdown"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial action=purchase
 | iplocation clientip
 | stats count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_LinkSwitcher_Table"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial action=purchase
 | iplocation clientip
 | stats count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_LinkSwitcher_Chart"},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial action=purchase
 | iplocation clientip
 | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_LinkSwitcher_LinkSwitcher_map"},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial referer_domain=$Referer$
| iplocation clientip
| stats count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_LinkList"},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial date_wday IN ($Wday$) 
| chart count by action date_wday","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_MultiSelect"},"ds_search_7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial status=5* method=$Method$
| stats count by status","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_RadioButton"},"ds_search_8":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial status=5* 
| iplocation clientip
| search Country=$Country$
| timechart count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_DropDown"},"ds_search_9":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial status=5*
| iplocation clientip
| top limit=$number$ clientip Country
| eval percent = round(percent,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_Text"},"ds_search_10":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial status=5*
| iplocation clientip
| stats count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$Period.earliest$","latest":"$Period.latest$"}},"name":"DS_Time_In_Panel"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"タイムピッカー","options":{"token":"Period","defaultValue":"-7d@h,now"}},"input_2":{"type":"input.text","title":"テキスト(数字):","options":{"token":"number","defaultValue":"5"}},"input_3":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"ドロップダウン","options":{"token":"Country"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"}},"input_4":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"ラジオボタン","options":{"token":"Method","items":[{"value":"get","label":"GET"},{"value":"post","label":"POST"}]}},"input_5":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"複数選択","options":{"token":"Wday","items":[{"value":"monday","label":"月曜日"},{"value":"tuesday","label":"火曜日"},{"value":"wednesday","label":"水曜日"},{"value":"thursday","label":"木曜日"},{"value":"friday","label":"金曜日"},{"value":"saturday","label":"土曜日"},{"value":"sunday","label":"日曜日"}]}},"input_6":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"リンクリスト","options":{"token":"Referer","items":[{"value":"http://www.bing.com","label":"bing.com"},{"value":"http://www.yahoo.com","label":"yahoo.com"},{"value":"http://www.google.com","label":"google.com"},{"value":"http://www.buttercupgames.com","label":"buttercupgames.com"}]}},"input_7":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"リンクスイッチ(可視化の選択)","options":{"token":"unused","items":[{"value":"table","label":"Table"},{"value":"chart","label":"Chart"},{"value":"map","label":"Map"}]}}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{"submitButton":false,"height":1616},"structure":[{"item":"viz_91QvO1qi","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":132}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":132,"w":1200,"h":168}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":300,"w":1200,"h":288}},{"item":"viz_map_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":588,"w":1200,"h":289}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":877,"w":300,"h":323}},{"item":"viz_table_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1200,"w":450,"h":650}},{"item":"viz_table_2","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":877,"w":300,"h":323}},{"item":"viz_chart_5","type":"block","position":{"x":450,"y":1200,"w":750,"h":650}},{"item":"viz_chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":877,"w":300,"h":323}},{"item":"viz_chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":900,"y":877,"w":300,"h":323}}],"globalInputs":["input_1","input_2","input_3","input_4","input_5","input_6","input_7"]},"description":"移行後に手動で微調整済み","title":"入力の移行 (Dashboard Studio)"}
